content: until *insert hook under the next vertical bar yo piece measures 1 ½ inches and pull up a loop through both the vertical bar and the loop on hook* repeat from *-* across knot at the end begin tunisian smock stitch block your piece while flat if desired row 1 fp *yo from the bottom to the top mattress stitch your edges together to form pick up next two vertical bars yo pull up a circle loop* repeat *-* across to end stitch yo bot- tom to top work edge stitch all forward if you are having trouble you can watch these passes should result in 1 extra stitch video tutorials tunisian knit & purl stitch row 1 rp work return pass https //www youtube com/watch we will now be offsetting our stitches from v=jimdltt8nfw&t=926s our forward pass of row 1 tunisian smock stitch row 2 fp yo from bottom to top tss under https //www youtube com/watch v=fj- vkiasn9s 1st bar of 1st v from previous row *yo from bottom to top pick up the second loop from the first v of previous row and first loop from next v from previous row yo draw through those 2 loops* repeat from *-* across row 2 rp work return pass repeat row 1 & 2 of tunisian smock stitch in pattern until work measures 9 ½ inches or to desired length for middle section
